meanings.definition: The state of lacking a future or prospects.
meanings.sent1: The futurelessness of the situation left everyone feeling uncertain.
meanings.sent2: The futurelessness of the economy was a cause for concern.
meanings.sent3: The futurelessness of the weather forecast made planning a picnic impossible.
meanings.sent4: The futurelessness of the abandoned town was a haunting reminder of better days.
meanings.sent5: The futurelessness of the desert stretched out endlessly before them.

meanings.definition: The quality of being without a future.
meanings.sent1: The futurelessness of the painting gave it a sense of timelessness.
meanings.sent2: The futurelessness of the story made it hard to predict the ending.
meanings.sent3: The futurelessness of the clock's ticking amused the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: The futurelessness of the stars in the night sky seemed to whisper secrets.
meanings.sent5: The futurelessness of the old tree made it a symbol of endurance.

meanings.definition: The condition of having no future.
meanings.sent1: The futurelessness of the decision weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent2: The futurelessness of the project made it hard to stay motivated.
meanings.sent3: The futurelessness of the empty fridge led to a creative cooking challenge.
meanings.sent4: The futurelessness of the road ahead seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent5: The futurelessness of the broken compass left them feeling lost.
